ComicInfo.Summary: The Monster Within Part Four: Other Points of View: Shadowhawk is transported to The Enclave, the hidden sanctuary of The Others, where he is given an herbal broth that temporarily cures him of the AIDS virus. When his human presence threatens to cause a civil war among the inhabitants of the city, he decides to leave, even though this means his disease will return.
ComicInfo.Title: The Monster Within Part Four: Other Points of View
